name: Tomb of Tomes
description:
Find the mystery of the library, all while losing your memories.

Spend your energy on the bookshelf to gain minutes for the spells. Don't forget to press the book button to read the books.

A game by ATKArcade (Members: ATKArcade, Miles A Art & Fanzee)

Art by Miles A Art

Music and Sound by Fanzee

Font 7:12Serif by Christain Munk
